Reconnaissance.name: API Endpoint Enumeration
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker attempts to discover and map out API endpoints
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Increased knowledge of the API structure, potentially leading to more targeted attacks

Reconnaissance.name: Array Structure Enumeration
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker uses the GET routes to map out the structure and relationships of arrays, classes, and subclasses
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Attacker gains understanding of system structure, potentially identifying vulnerabilities or sensitive data locations

Reconnaissance.name: Array Information Gathering
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker could use multiple GET endpoints to gather comprehensive information about arrays and their usage.
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: The attacker could gain insights into manufacturing processes, product details, and system vulnerabilities.

Reconnaissance.name: Enumeration of Array Classes
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker uses the GET /v1/array-classes endpoint to gather information about the system's structure
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Information disclosure, aiding in further targeted attacks

Reconnaissance.name: Enumeration of Array Classes
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker attempts to enumerate array classes to gather information about the manufacturing system structure
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Exposure of system structure and potential vulnerabilities

Reconnaissance.name: Enumeration of Array Subclasses
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker attempts to gather information about the structure and content of array subclasses
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Exposure of sensitive data structures and relationships, aiding in further targeted attacks

Reconnaissance.name: Batch Parameter Group Enumeration
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker uses the query endpoint to gather information about existing batch parameter groups
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Attacker gains knowledge about the structure and naming conventions of batch parameter groups, facilitating further targeted attacks

Reconnaissance.name: Batch Run Information Gathering
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker uses the query endpoints to collect information about batch runs and parameters
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Attacker gains insights into manufacturing processes, potentially identifying vulnerabilities

Reconnaissance.name: Batch Run Enumeration
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker attempts to enumerate batch run IDs to gather information about ongoing manufacturing processes
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Information gathering for targeted attacks on specific batch runs

Reconnaissance.name: Batch Run Schedule Enumeration
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker could attempt to enumerate batch run schedules to gather intelligence on manufacturing processes
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Exposure of production schedules and potential targeting of specific batch runs

Reconnaissance.name: Batch Run Enumeration
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker could use the distinct values endpoint to enumerate batch run information
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Exposure of batch run patterns and potentially sensitive identifiers

Reconnaissance.name: Batch Run Information Gathering
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker uses the GET route to collect information about batch runs and procedures
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Attacker gains insights into manufacturing processes and potential vulnerabilities

Reconnaissance.name: Batch Run Document Enumeration
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker could attempt to enumerate and gather information about batch run documents
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Information disclosure about manufacturing processes and sensitive data

Reconnaissance.name: Batch Template Enumeration
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker uses the query endpoints to gather information about batch templates
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Information gathering for further attacks, understanding the structure of batch templates

Reconnaissance.name: Batch Template Enumeration
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker attempts to enumerate batch templates and their structures
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Gathering of sensitive manufacturing process information

Reconnaissance.name: Batch Template Structure Mapping
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker could use these endpoints to map out the structure of batch templates, unit operations, and procedures
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Detailed knowledge of manufacturing processes, potentially exposing trade secrets or vulnerabilities

Reconnaissance.name: API Enumeration
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker attempts to enumerate available API endpoints and their parameters
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Attacker gains knowledge about the API structure and potential vulnerabilities

Reconnaissance.name: Enumeration of Dispensement and Output IDs
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker attempts to enumerate valid dispensement and output IDs by making multiple GET requests
Reconnaissance.potential_impact: Discovery of valid IDs could lead to unauthorized access to sensitive information

Reconnaissance.name: Equipment Enumeration
Reconnaissance.description: An attacker uses the GET /v1/equipment endpoint to enumerate all available equipment in the system

issues.description: Some routes marked as 'in_scope' might be less critical and could potentially be moved to 'out_of_scope'. For example, some GET routes that only retrieve non-sensitive data or routes with proper authorization checks might be overclassified.
There are some inconsistencies in risk level assignments. For instance, some similar routes have different risk levels without clear justification.

suggested_improvements: Review the risk levels assigned to similar routes to ensure consistency. For example, standardize the risk level for all routes that involve file uploads or data exports.
Consider adding more specific MITRE ATT&CK techniques to each attack scenario for more precise mapping.
Expand on the potential impact descriptions to include more specific consequences related to pharmaceutical manufacturing, such as regulatory non-compliance or patient safety risks.
Include more detailed mitigation strategies for each high-risk route or attack scenario.
Consider grouping similar routes together in the analysis to reduce redundancy and improve readability.
Add a section on API rate limiting and monitoring recommendations to prevent abuse of high-risk endpoints.
Include an analysis of the authentication and authorization mechanisms used across the API to identify potential weaknesses or areas for improvement.

testing_priorities: Address focus area: Access control mechanisms
Test against Initial Access scenarios: 43 identified
Test against Privilege Escalation scenarios: 92 identified
Test against Defense Evasion scenarios: 43 identified
